title: Fix Glow man face wash not displaying in product catalog

requirements.text: Investigate and fix why the 'Glow man face wash' product is not appearing in the product catalog display despite being added to the backend
acceptanceCriteria: 'Glow man face wash' product appears in the product catalog on the frontend
Product displays with correct name, description, price (₹120), and image (glow-man-facewash.dim_800x800.png)
Product can be added to cart successfully
Product appears under the 'cleansers' category filter

requirements.text: Verify that the 'Glow man face wash' product exists in the backend products Map with correct data including name, category 'cleanser', price 120, and adequate stock quantity
acceptanceCriteria: Product record exists in backend storage
Product has correct name matching 'Glow man face wash'
Product has stock quantity greater than 0

requirements.text: Ensure the imageHelpers.ts utility correctly maps 'Glow man face wash' product to the glow-man-facewash.dim_800x800.png static asset and that this mapping is used in the ProductCard component
acceptanceCriteria: getProductImage function in imageHelpers.ts returns correct path for 'Glow man face wash'
ProductCard component successfully renders the face wash product image

constraints: Do not modify the existing price of ₹120 for Glow man face wash
Use the existing static asset glow-man-facewash.dim_800x800.png
nonGoals: Adding new products beyond fixing the display of Glow man face wash
Changing the visual design or layout of the product catalog
Modifying the cart or checkout functionality
